name: Dragonic Overlord the End
effect:
[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle it attacked, activate one of the effects below. But, you cannot activate the same effect in the same turn.
・If your hand has four or less cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.
・If your soul has a card with "Overlord" in its card name, [COST][discard three cards from your hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets [Power] +10000/drive -1 until end of turn.

name: Spinning Valiant
effect:
[CONT](VC):All units can only attack the vanguard.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, if your front row has four or more units, until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000, then, [COST][Counter-Blast 4], and when your opponent would call from his or her hand to (GC), he or she must call three or more at the same time.

name: Harmonics Messiah
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, search your deck for up to one card, put it on (RC) as a locked card, and shuffle your deck. (Locked cards cannot do anything. They are unlocked and turned face up as [Stand] at the end of their owner's turn.)
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle it attacked, if your soul has a grade 3 or greater card, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], choose any number of any fighters' locked cards, unlock them, draw the same number of cards, and two rear-guards in your front row get [Power] +15000 until end of turn.

name: Dragonic Blademaster
effect:
[CONT](VC):If your opponent has no rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Critical] +1.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If "Wyvern Strike, Doha" and "Wyvern Strike, Garan" are on your (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1] grade 3 & discard two cards from your hand], retire all of your opponent's rear-guards, call a vision token to (RC), and at the end of that turn, retire that token. (Visions are grade 3/[Power] 13000/[Critical] 1, and can twin drive)

name: Wyvern Strike, Doha
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Wyvern Strike, Garan", call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](RC):During the battle it attacked, if your opponent has no rear-guards, your opponent cannot call normal units from hand to (GC).

name: Ultra Beast Deity, Illuminal Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle that your rear-guard's attack did not hit, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], [Stand] that unit, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. That unit attacks your opponent's vanguard.
[AUTO](VC/RC)[1/turn]:When your other unit's attack hits, this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.

name: Kick Kick Typhoon
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, if this unit is on (VC) or an additional (RC), one of your units gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When it attacks, if all of the (RC) in your front row have rear-guards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] one of your other rear-guards.

name: Lady Battler of the Gravity Well
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], look at the top card of your deck, put it on (RC) as a locked card, and draw a card. (Locked cards cannot do anything. They are unlocked and turned face up as [Stand] at the end of their owner's turn.)

name: Sunset Edge, Duskblade
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack it boosted hits a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and bind it face down. If your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, draw a card.

name: Shine Bardiche Dragon
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one "Dragonic Blademaster" from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Wyvern Strike, Dekat
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put this unit into your soul], choose one of your "Dragonic Overlord the End", and when your opponent would call from his or her hand to (GC) during the battle that unit attacked this turn, he or she must call two or more at the same time.

name: Red Dive Griffin
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your opponent's guardian is placed during the battle it boosted a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of those guardians, retire it, and at the end of that battle, retire this unit.

name: Glad Grad
effect: [AUTO](VC):When it attacks, if you have two or more rear-guards in [Rest], [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. If you have five or more rear-guards in [Rest], [Stand] two rear-guards in your front row.

name: Beast Deity, Eclair Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed during your main phase, if you have a grade 3 vanguard with "Beast Deity" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of turn, and attacks your opponent's vanguard. If that attack did not hit, [Stand] this unit at the end of that battle.

name: Beast Deity, Glanz Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other unit attacks, If you have a grade 3 vanguard with "Beast Deity" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.

name: Claw of Occlusion, Ghastly Nail
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 for each of your locked cards.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and you may put a card from your hand on (RC) as a locked card. If you do, draw a card. (Locked cards cannot do anything. They are unlocked and turned face up as [Stand] at the end of their owner's turn.)

name: Blast Monk of the Thundering Foot
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and bind it face down. If you chose a grade 2 or greater card, [Soul-Charge 1].

name: Destiny Dealer
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on (RC) as a locked card.
[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top card of your deck, and put it on (RC) as a locked card. (Locked cards cannot do anything. They are unlocked and turned face up as [Stand] at the end of their owner's turn.)

name: Exile Dragon
effect:
[ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it attacked a vanguard, if your opponent has no rear-guards in the same column as this unit, you may return this unit to your hand.

name: Lava Blast Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it attacked a vanguard, [COST][put one "Dragon Knight, Fahim" and "Dragon Knight, Nasser" each on your (RC) to your soul], [Stand] this unit, and this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.

name: Wyvern Strike, Garan
effect:
[CONT](RC):During your turn, if your opponent has no rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](RC):When the attack it boosted "Wyvern Strike, Doha" hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and [Soul-Charge 1].

name: Dragon Dancer, Josee
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.[AUTO](VC):When placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand.

name: Girly Dolly
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):If there are five or more <Hero> on your (RC), all of your guardians get [Shield] +10000.

name: Savanna Wild
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 2], and retire all of your opponent's rear-guards in the same column as this unit. If one or less units were retired, this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.

name: Stylish Hustler
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When your other rear-guard is retired by the ability of your opponent's card, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and put one of those cards into your hand.
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks, this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of that battle for each card in your damage zone.

name: Spin Kid
effect: [AUTO](VC):When ridden from a grade 0, [COST][reveal a "Spinning Valiant" from your hand], and deal one damage to your and your opponent's vanguard. (You perform the damage check before your opponent)

name: Drill the Dual
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it boosts, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and until end of turn, when your opponent would call from his or her hand to (GC) for the battle the unit this unit boosted attacked, he or she must call two or more at the same time. (Includes this battle)

name: Competent Mechanic, Spechanic
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.[AUTO](VC):When placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand.

name: Topological Dragon
effect: [AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][retire two rear-guards], and this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Remarkable Burst Monk
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it is unlocked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand, and if it is a grade 3, then, [COST][discard two cards from your hand], and [Stand] your vanguard.

name: Binodal Dragon
effect:
[ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], and draw a card.
[AUTO]:When retired from (RC) during your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of turn, when your opponent would call from his or her hand to (GC) for the battle your vanguard attacked, he or she must call two or more at the same time.

name: Calderon Wing
effect: [ACT](RC):If "Harmonics Messiah" is on your (VC) or (RC), or if you have a locked card, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & lock this unit], and [Counter-Charge 1]. (Locked cards cannot do anything. They are unlocked and turned face up as [Stand] at the end of their owner's turn.)

name: Iron Staff of Forbid Extinguish, Ilinvert
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand.

name: Dragon Knight, Zarina
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your opponent's rear-guard is retired by your vanguard's ability, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and call a grade 1 or less card from your drop zone to a (RC) in the same column as this unit.

name: Dragon Knight, Fahim
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a grade 3 rear-guard, this unit gets [Power] +10000.

name: Dragon Knight, Mukhtar
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 2 & Soul-Blast 1], choose two of your opponent's rear-guards, retire them, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Flame of Varied Change, Peklenc
effect: (This unit has intercept instead of boost)

name: Dragon Knight, Nasser
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, call up to one grade 3 from among them to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

name: Wyvern Strike, Membuas
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it boosts, if your opponent has no rear-guards, until end of that battle, when your opponent would call from his or her hand to (GC), he or she must call two or more at the same time.

name: Wyvern Kid, Lagra
effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card.

name: Dragon Monk, Genjo
effect: (You may only have up to four cards with "[Heal] HEAL" in a deck.)

name: Warrior of Chakram
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard is attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of turn for each card in your damage zone.

name: Vernal Cracker
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks, this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of that battle for each of your other rear-guards.

name: Smash Masher
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for each card in your damage zone.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if you have a grade 3 <Hero> vanguard, [COST][put this unit into your soul], and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Sling Burster
effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card.

name: Wall Boy
effect: (You may only have up to four cards with "[Heal] HEAL" in a deck.)

name: Deep Scorpius
effect: [AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards with the highest grade, bind it face down, and you draw cards equal to that unit's grade.

name: Envelope Panther
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks, if you have a locked card, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit and one of your vanguards get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Spinodal Dragon
effect:
[ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Retire this unit], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and bind it face down.
[AUTO]:When retired from (RC) during your turn, one of your vanguards gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Blow Monk of Twin Foot
effect: (This unit has intercept instead of boost)

name: Black Star of Increase, Balerother
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your locked card is put, or when your card is locked, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Neon Messiah
effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card.
